statements: DELETE FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE id = 100 AND date_added < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY date_added DESC;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE identity_number = '123456789' AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM block_notification WHERE notification_sent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE is_blocked = TRUE AND identity_type = 'Fraudulent';
DELETE FROM failed_login_attempts WHERE user_id = 5 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.100';
